## Authors' Coupling

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r net, echo=FALSE}
library(devtools)
library(RTextTools)
library(xtable)
library(bibliometrix)
library(ggplot2)
library(kableExtra)
library(devtools)
library(kableExtra)
A <- readFiles("savedrecs.174.txt")
M <- convert2df(A, dbsource = "wos", format = "plaintext")
M <- metaTagExtraction(M, Field = "AU_CO", sep = ";")
#Authors' Coupling
NetMatrix <- biblioNetwork(M, analysis = "coupling", network = "authors", sep = ";")
net <- networkPlot(NetMatrix,  normalize = "salton", weighted=NULL, n = 40, 
                Title = "Authors' Coupling", type = "fruchterman", size=5,size.cex=T,
                remove.multiple=TRUE,labelsize=0.8,label.n=39,label.cex=F)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
##Author Collaboration
```{r net1, echo=FALSE}
#Author Collaboration
M <- metaTagExtraction(M, Field = "AU", sep = ";")
NetMatrix <- biblioNetwork(M, analysis = "collaboration", network = "authors", sep = ";")
net1 <- networkPlot(NetMatrix, n = 50, Title = "Author Collaboration",  alpha =0.5, verbose = T, edges.min =0,
                   type = "fruchterman", size=TRUE, remove.multiple=FALSE,labelsize=0.7,cluster="none")

```

##Country Collaboration
```{r net2, echo=FALSE}
#Country Collaboration
M <- metaTagExtraction(M, Field = "AU_CO", sep = ";")
NetMatrix <- biblioNetwork(M, analysis = "collaboration", network = "countries", sep = ";")
net2 <- networkPlot(NetMatrix, n = dim(NetMatrix)[1], Title = "Country Collaboration", verbose = T,
                type = "fruchterman", size=TRUE, remove.multiple=FALSE,labelsize=0.7,cluster="none")

```

##co-citation network
```{r net3, echo=FALSE}
M <- metaTagExtraction(M, Field = "AU_CO", sep = ";")
NetMatrix <- biblioNetwork(M, analysis = "co-citation", network = "references", sep = ";")
net3 <- networkPlot(NetMatrix, n = 30, Title = "Co-Citation Network", verbose = T, cluster = "louvain", edges.min =2,
                type = "auto",  size=T, remove.multiple=FALSE, labelsize=0.8,edgesize = 5)

```

## Create keyword co-occurrences network
```{r net4, echo=FALSE}
# Create keyword co-occurrences network
M <- metaTagExtraction(M, Field = "AU_CO", sep = ";")
NetMatrix <- biblioNetwork(M, analysis = "co-occurrences", network = "keywords", sep = ";")
net4 <- networkPlot(NetMatrix, normalize="association", weighted=T, n = 30, Title = "Keyword Co-occurrences", verbose = T,
                type = "fruchterman", size=T,edgesize = 5,labelsize=0.7)
```
